import { Component, Input, HostListener } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-slides', templateUrl: './slides.component.html', styleUrls: ['./slides.component.css'] }) export class SlidesComponent { @Input() photosSources: string[] = []; currentIndex: number = 0; touchstartX: number = 0; touchendX: number = 0; nextPhoto() { if (this.currentIndex !== this.photosSources.length - 1) { this.currentIndex += 1; } else { this.currentIndex = 0; } } prevPhoto() { if (this.currentIndex !== 0) { this.currentIndex -= 1; } else { this.currentIndex = this.photosSources.length - 1; } } @HostListener('touchstart', ['$event']) onTouchStart(event: TouchEvent) { this.touchstartX = event.changedTouches[0].screenX; } @HostListener('touchend', ['$event']) onTouchEnd(event: TouchEvent) { this.touchendX = event.changedTouches[0].screenX; this.handleGesture(); } handleGesture() { if (this.touchendX < this.touchstartX) { this.nextPhoto(); } if (this.touchendX > this.touchstartX) { this.prevPhoto(); } } }
